name: Yellow Sails
description:
Current build v0.02 - 27 June 2020
by Studio Moonmen

A surreal dream exploration game created for the "Dream Diary Jam 4" event and submitted as a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. Go to bed and dream of strange islands across distant oceans...

There are currently three islands to discover and one effect to collect. The game will be updated with more content in the future.

Yume Nikki is a game made in RPGMaker 2003 by Kikiyama. It's a weird and beautiful experience that you should definitely try!
